duties_responsibilities.duty: Work steel efficiently and accurately to build a level and plumb building in a fast-paced environment.
Rigging signaling, bolt up structural members, read erection and shop drawings, and fabricate structural members in the field.
Install stairs, guardrails, and grab rails, and handle plumbing of structural steel.
Use gridlines and benchmarks to complete layout, work at heights, and ensure fall protection and safety equipment knowledge.
Signal crane, connect steel, operate powered hand tools, forklifts, and aerial working platforms.
Maintain safety at all times, enforce required PPE, and have the knowledge to do the job.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma / GED, OSHA 10 preferred
